name: Road Toad (itch)
description:
Road Toad is a game about a toad on a road! You must make it as far as possible through a constantly generating sequence of roads, grass and canals, all while cars collide around you! You can, of course, swim through the canals because you're a toad. Its a simple recreation of frogger I made using the Playbuffer framework for a project but theres lots of fun settings to change the game up in the options menu so I hope you enjoy it!

P.S theres no clicking in any of the menus you just mouse over buttons, theres no audio for performance reasons also the score counters are broken for legal reasons
